name: header1_OriginalFormat
description: Format

name: header1_Year
description: Year (eg 1995)

name: header1_Yday
description: Day (1 to 366)

name: header1_SlotNum
description: Slot Number (1 to 48)

name: header1_DataType
description: Data Type  (=9)

name: header1_ImageProcessingStatus
description: Image Processing Performed contents are partially valid in the header (values 1-4 may be present), (valid in trailer)://1=Realtime rectification (never set)//2=Batch rectification (never set)//3=Real Time Unrectified but misregistration corrected//4=Batch Unrectified but misregistration corrected//5=Realtime/Splines 4x4/ Splines interpolation of DM//6=Batch/Splines 4x4/ Splines interpolation of DM//9=Real time/nearest neighbour/ Bilinear interpolation of DM//10=Batch/ nearest neighbour/ Bilinear interpolation of DM //25=image is unrectified (ie corrected for misregistration only) (never set)

name: header1_SpectralContent
description: Spectral Content. Add together the following values depending on content (valid in trailer)://VIS1=1 VIS2=2 VIS3=4 VIS4=8 IR1=16 IR2=32 WV1=64 WV2=128

name: header1_NumScans
description: Number of scans this slot

name: header1_NumScanValidRapid
description: Scan number (only set for rapid scan slots)

name: header1_RecLength
description: Record Length (15360)

name: header1_NumRec
description: Number of Records (2506)

name: header1_NumRecHead
description: Number of Records in Header (3)

name: header1_FileType
description: Type (="STANDARD")

name: header1_SatCode
description: Satellite Code (eg "M4")

name: header1_JulianSlotNum
description: Julian Slot Number: modified julian day*48 + slot number in current day, where modified //julian day 0 = 1 january 1950

name: header1_LastLineImage
description: Last line of image (valid in trailer)

name: header1_VisChannnelInUse
description: Visible Channel in use

name: header1_IrChannnelInUse
description: IR Channel in use

name: header1_WvChannnelInUse
description: WV Channel in use

name: header1_ScanMode
description: Scanning mode (not set)

name: header1_SecsPastMidnightForSHL
description: Seconds past midnight for Southern horizon line

name: header1_VisibleSouthNorth
description: Visible South and North (valid in trailer)

name: header1_FishRemoval
description: Fish removal (1) =0 Removal OFF (1) =1 Removal ON (2)    IR fish found//(3)      WV fish found (4)       Number of replaced fish   (5)    Lines searched//(valid in trailer)

name: header1_NumLineWithRadposAnomalies
description: Number of rectified raw image lines used with RADPOS anomalies (valid in trailer)

name: header1_RectInterpMethod
description: Rectification Interpolation method://      0      Cubic Spline            1      Nearest Neighbour

name: header1_MixedVisModeFlag
description: Mixed Visible channel mode flag

name: header1_lEastWestCorrAppFlag
description: East West Corrections Applied flag

name: header1_LensRotationCorrApplFlag
description: Lens Rotation Correction Applied flag

name: header1_VariableGainCorrAppFlag
description: Variable Gain Correction Applied flag

name: header1_NullDefMatFlag
description: Null Deformation Matrix flag://     0      Normal Deformation Matrix         1     Null Deformation Matrix

name: header1_IPSdataVersion
description: IPS Data Version number

name: header1_IPSalgoVersion
description: IPS Algorithm Version number

name: header1_IPSheadRec1Version
description: IPS Header Record 1 Version number

name: header1_WhereRectifiedIndicator
description: Where Rectified From indicator://     1      Online Rectification,        2       Offline Rectification

name: header1_FirstLineUsed
description: First raw image line used (valid in trailer)

name: header1_LastLineUsed
description: Last raw image line used (valid in trailer)

name: header1_VisSouthLostLineTable
description: VIS South lost line table (valid in trailer)

name: header1_VisNorthLostLineTable
description: VIS North lost line table (valid in trailer)

name: header1_IrLostLineTable
description: IR lost line table (valid in trailer)

name: header1_WvLostLineTable
description: WV lost line table (valid in trailer)

name: header1_DropBitTestControlCodes
description: Dropped bit test control codes (valid in trailer)

name: header1_DropBitHandlingStatsViss
description: Dropped bit handling stats, for each VISs channel (valid in trailer)

name: header1_DropBitHandlingStatsVisn
description: Dropped bit handling stats, for each VISn channel (valid in trailer)

name: header1_DropBitHandlingStatsIr
description: Dropped bit handling stats, for each IR channel (valid in trailer)

name: header1_DropBitHandlingStatsWv
description: Dropped bit handling stats, for each WV channel (valid in trailer)

name: header2_JulianSlotNum
description: Julian slot

name: header2_GeometricQuality
description: Image geometric quality://0 =nominal 1 =attitude unknown//2 =orbit unknown 3 =horizon incomplete//4 =no deformation calculated 5 =termination due to RADPOS - LID inconsistencies//6 =problems with HR interpretation data

name: header2_NoGridPointsDefMat
description: Number of grid points on which deformation matrix is based (initially 26)

name: header2_DeformStarts
description: Line resp. pixel where deform. Grid starts (initially 50)

name: header2_DeformEnds
description: Line resp. pixel where deform. Grid ends (initially 2450)

name: header2_DeformStep
description: Line resp. pixel step of deformation grid (initially 96)

name: header2_XDeformationMatrix
description: Deform. matrix (X-comp of vectors) (set to zeros)

name: header2_YDeformationMatrix
description: Deform. matrix (Y-comp of vectors) (set to zeros)

name: header2_WefaxSatId
description: Satellite ID for WEFAX dissemination

name: header2_HrSatId
description: Satellite ID for HR dissemination

name: header2_Vis1RegParamConst
description: VIS1 registration parameters constant term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_Vis2RegParamConst
description: VIS2 registration parameters constant term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_Vis3RegParamConst
description: VIS3 registration parameters constant term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_Vis4RegParamConst
description: VIS4 registration parameters constant term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_Ir1RegParamConst
description: IR1 registration parameters constant term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_Ir2RegParamConst
description: IR 2 registration parameters constant term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_Wv1RegParamConst
description: WV1 registration parameters constant term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_Wv2RegParamConst
description: WV 2 registration parameters constant term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_Vis1RegParamLinear
description: VIS1 registration parameters linear term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_Vis2RegParamLinear
description: VIS2 registration parameters linear term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_Vis3RegParamLinear
description: VIS3 registration parameters linear term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_Vis4RegParamLinear
description: VIS4 registration parameters linear term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_Ir1RegParamLinear
description: IR1 registration parameters linear term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_Ir2RegParamLinear
description: IR 2 registration parameters linear term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_Wv1RegParamLinear
description: WV1 registration parameters linear term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_Wv2RegParamLinear
description: WV 2 registration parameters linear term (1)=pixel direction, (2) = line direction

name: header2_SeasonaalAmplitude
description: Amplitude of seasonal effect (not set)

name: header2_SeasonalPhase
description: Phase of seasonal effect (not set)

name: header2_DefMataFineTuneCorrYdir
description: Deformation matrix fine-tuning correction  line direction

name: header2_DefMatFineTuneCorrXdir
description: Deformation matrix fine-tuning correction  pixel direction

name: header2_EarthEquatorialRadius
description: Earth equatorial radius (km)

name: header2_EarthPolarRadius
description: Earth polar radius (km)

name: header2_DistFromEarthCentre
description: Distance from Earth centre (km)

name: header2_RadiometerSteppinAngle
description: Radiometer stepping angle (radians?)

name: header2_NominalSubSatelliteLongitude
description: Nominal Sub-satellite longitude (radians)

name: header2_CodeForNominalSubSatellitePoint
description: Code for nominal sub-satellite point

name: header2_NullDefMatUsedFlag
description: Null Deformation Used Flag. Set TRUE if used

name: header2_Alpha0
description: ALPHA0 parameter

name: header2_Sat_OffsetFromSSP
description: Offset of satellite from SSP (degrees)

name: header2_AbsPositionSat
description: Absolute position of satellite (degrees)

name: header2_SICClockPeriod
description: SIC clock period

name: header2_TimeDurationPixel
description: Time duration of pixel

name: header2_EquatorialRadEastAtmHeight
description: Equatorial radius eastern atmos. height

name: header2_EquatorialRadWestAtmHeight
description: Equatorial radius western atmos. height

name: header2_EquatorialRadSouthAtmHeight
description: Equatorial radius southern atmos. height

name: header2_EquatorialRadNorthAtmHeight
description: Equatorial radius northern atmos. height

name: header2_RefinedSouthHorizRADPOS
description: Refined southern horizon RADPOS

name: header2_RefinedNorthHorizRADPOS
description: Refined northern horizon RADPOS

name: header2_RADPosLineIDdiff
description: RADPOS-LINEID difference

name: header2_TimeRADPosRelationCoeff
description: Time-RADPOS relationship coefficients

name: header2_F0ScanningParam
description: F0 scanning parameter

name: header2_F1ScanningParam
description: F1 scanning parameter

name: header2_Attitude
description: Attitude

name: header2_PixelSamplingRateCoeff
description: Pixel sampling rate coefficients

name: header2_SpinDeviationCoeff
description: Spin deviation coefficients

name: header2_RawImageSkewnessCoeff
description: Raw image skewnwss coefficients

name: header2_AttitudeAttDriftRate
description: Attitude and attitude drift rate

name: header2_EpochAMVG3
description: Epoch of AMVG3

name: header2_F2ScanningParam
description: F2 scanning parameter

name: header2_F3ScanningParam
description: F3 scanning parameter (no longer  used)

name: header2_OrbitCoordinatesMgfImageStart
description: Orbit coordinates in MGF at image start time

name: header2_OrbitCoordinatesMgfImageEnd
description: Orbit coordinates in MGF at image end time

name: header2_CartCompAttitudeImageStart
description: Cartesian component of attitude at image start time

name: header2_CartCompAttitudeImageEnd
description: Cartesian component of attitude at image end time

description: Orbit coordinates in Earth fixed frame at image start time

name: header2_OrbitCoordinatesFixedEarthImageEnd
description: Orbit coordinates in Earth fixed frame at image end time

name: header2_EarthCentreInPixels
description: Earth centre in pixels

name: header2_EarthCentreInLines
description: Earth centre in lines

name: header2_ProgramErrorLevelStopCode
description: Program error level/stop code

name: header2_LensCoeffType
description: Lens coefficient type

name: header2_SunCoordMgfImage_start
description: Sun coordinates in MGF at image start time

name: header2_SunCoordMgfImage_end
description: Sun coordinates in MGF at image end time

name: header2_NoVisSouthHorizPairs
description: Total number of visible South horizon pairs

name: header2_NoVisSouthHorizPairsQuality
description: Total number of visible South horizon pairs with acceptable quality

name: header2_NoVisNorthHorizPairs
description: Total number of visible North horizon pairs

name: header2_NoVisNorthHorizPairsQuality
description: Total number of visible North horizon pairs with acceptable quality

name: header2_NoIrHorizPairs
description: Total number of Infrared horizon pairs

name: header2_NoIrHorizPairsQuality
description: Total number of Infrared horizon pairs with acceptable quality

name: header2_EastWestCenteringBiasCoeff
description: East-West centring bias coefficients

name: header2_EquatorialAtmosphericHeight
description: Equatorial atmospheric height (km)

name: header2_THETA1ParamFromB0Wraparound
description: THETA1 parameter (from B0 wraparound)

name: header2_EastWestLensCorrSlotEnd
description: East-West lens correction at end of slot

name: header2_NorthSouthLensCorrSlotEnd
description: North-South lens correction at end of slot

name: header2_StableAttitudeAvailFlag
description: TRUE if stable attitude available this slot

name: header2_EeastWestBiasCoeffAvailThisSlotFlag
description: TRUE if E-W bias coeffs available this slot

name: header2_CalibratedTH1G3AvailFlag
description: TRUE if calibrated TH1G3 available this slot

name: header2_CalibratedT1HG3AvailFlag
description: TRUE if calibrated T1HG3 available this slot

name: header2_THETA1ParamFromHousekeeping
description: THETA1 parameter (from housekeeping)//

name: header3_JulianSlotNum
description: Julian slot number

name: header3_JulianDay
description: Julian day (01 Jan 1950 =Day 0)

name: header3_SlotNum
description: Slot number

name: header3_NominalImageTime
description: Nominal image time (HHMM)

name: header3_SlotType
description: Slot type: 0 = no data,  1 = nominal slot (never set), 2 = service slot, 3 = MOP format ,//4 = MAP slot (mini-scans) //(valid in the trailer)

name: header3_ImageQualityFlag
description: Image quality flag 1 =grids can be added 2 =coastlines can be added//      3 =both can be added 0 =should not add either//(valid in trailer)

name: header3_SatId
description: Imaging Sat ID  (M4, M5, ..)

name: header3_SubSatPointDisplacementInPixels
description: Sub-satellite point displacement in pixels (valid in trailer)

name: header3_SubSatPointDisplacementInLines
description: Sub-satellite point displacement in lines (valid in trailer)

name: header3_VissMissingLineTable
description: Missing line table VISs (rectified image) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_Visn_missingLineTable
description: Missing line table VISn (rectified image) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_IrMissingLineTable
description: Missing line table IR (rectified image) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_WvMissingLineTable
description: Missing line table WV (rectified image) Bit =1: no missing data in line//      Bit =0: some missing data in line//(valid in trailer)

name: header3_NumMissingLinesReplaced
description: Number of missing lines replaced (valid in trailer)

name: header3_NumBlackLines1
description: Number of black lines in lines 67 - 866 for each channel: (1)=VIS, (2)=IR, (3)=WV//(valid in trailer)

name: header3_NumBlackLines2
description: Number of black lines in lines 867 - 1666 for each channel: //(valid in trailer)

name: header3_NumBlackLines3
description: Number of black lines in lines 1667 - 2466 for each channel: //(valid in trailer)

name: header3_WefaxAnnotation
description: Annotation for WEFAX formats (METn DD MMM YYYY hh mm)

name: header3_ImageQualityAnnotation
description: Annotation for image quality (valid in trailer) (never set)

name: header3_SpectralContent
description: Spectral contents VIS (for dissemination)//Spectral contents IR (for dissemination)//Spectral contents WV (for dissemination)//0 =no data 1 =VIS 1 2 =VIS 2 3 =VIS 1+2 4 =IR 1 5 =IR 2 6 =WV 1 7 =WV 2 8 =VIS 3 9 =VIS 4//10 =VIS 2 +3 11 =VIS 2 +4 12 =VIS 3 +4

name: header3_DeformationUsed
description: Deformation model used://3 = Batch,        -3 =Batch, null deformation//7 = Real time,   -7 =Real time, null deformation//(valid in trailer)

name: header3_BbIrCountForSpaceView
description: BB IR count for space view calibration (XXX.XXX): corresponds to delta count between hot black body and space, averaged by IPS. (valid in trailer)

name: header3_StdBbIrCountForSpaceview
description: Standard deviation of BB IR count for space view calibration (X.XX) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_BbWvCountForSpaceview
description: BB WV count for space view calibration (XXX.XXX): corresponds to delta count between hot black body and space, averaged by IPS. (valid in trailer)

name: header3_StdBbWvCountForSpaceView
description: Standard deviation of BB WV count for space view calibration (X.XX) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_BbColdTemp
description: Temp. of 'cold' black body in K (XXX.XX): : this only for nominal (not space view) calibration. (valid in trailer)

name: header3_BbWarmTemp
description: Temp. of 'hot' black body in K (XXX.XX): for nominal and space view calibration (valid in trailer)

name: header3_BbIrCountNominal
description: BB IR count for nominal calibration mode (XXX.XXX): corresponds to delta count between hot black body and space, averaged by IPS. (valid in trailer)

name: header3_StdBbIrCountNominal
description: Standard deviation of black body IR count for nominal calibration mode (X.XX) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_BbWvCountNominal
description: BB WV count for nominal calibration mode (XXX.XXX): corresponds to delta count between hot black body and space, averaged by IPS. (valid in trailer)

name: header3_StdBbWvCountNominal
description: Standard deviation of black body WV count for nominal calibration mode (X.XX) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_BbCalibrationTimestamp
description: Timestamp for black body calibration (DayDayDaySlotSlot) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_MpefAabsIrCal
description: MPEF absolute IR calibration (0.XXXXX): most recent information available to IPS, previous slot or earlier (valid in trailer)

name: header3_MpefIrSpaceCount
description: MPEF IR space count (XX.X): most recent information available to IPS, previous slot or earlier//(valid in trailer)

name: header3_MpefIrCalibrationTimestamp
description: MPEF Timestamp for IR calibration (DayDayDaySlotSlot): most recent information available to IPS, previous slot or earlier (valid in trailer)

name: header3_MpefAbsWvCal
description: MPEF absolute WV calibration (0.XXXXX): most recent information available to IPS, previous slot or earlier//(valid in trailer)

name: header3_MpefWvSpaceCount
description: MPEF  WV space count (XX.X): most recent information available to IPS, previous slot or earlier//(valid in trailer)

name: header3_MpefWvCalibrationTimestamp
description: MPEF stamp for WV calibration (DayDayDaySlotSlot)//(valid in trailer)

name: header3_AllChannelGains
description: Gains for IR, WV, VIS 1 or 4, VIS 2 or 3 (GiGiGwGwGvGvG2G2) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_RightAscensionAattSouth
description: Right ascension attitude South (degree) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_DeclinationAttSouth
description: Declination of attitude South (degree) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_RightAscensionAttNorth
description: Right ascension attitude North (degree) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_DeclinationAttNorth
description: Declination of attitude North (degree) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_RefinedAttitudeXYZ
description: X, Y, Z of refined attitude (valid in trailer)

name: header3_RightAscensionDeclinationMeanAtt
description: Right ascension & declination of mean refined attitude (valid in trailer)

name: header3_NoSlotsWithRefinedAttitude
description: Number of slots of refined attitude (valid in trailer)

name: header3_SpinDurMinusNominalSpinDur
description: Spin duration minus nominal spin duration (valid in trailer)

name: header3_EclipseOperation
description: Eclipse operation (valid in trailer)

name: header3_Decontamination
description: Decontamination (valid in trailer)

name: header3_Manoeuvre
description: Manoeuvre (valid in trailer)

name: header3_View
description: TRUE =Earth FALSE =Sun (valid in trailer)

name: header3_Ir1On
description: IR 1 On (valid in trailer)

name: header3_Ir2On
description: IR 2 On (valid in trailer)

name: header3_Wv1On
description: WV 1 On (valid in trailer)

name: header3_Wv2On
description: WV 2 On (valid in trailer)

name: header3_Vis1On
description: VIS 1 On (valid in trailer)

name: header3_Vis2On
description: VIS 2 On (valid in trailer)

name: header3_Vis3On
description: VIS 3 On (valid in trailer)

name: header3_Vis4On
description: VIS 4 On (valid in trailer)

name: header3_ImageStatus
description: Image status (valid in trailer)//1 =Horizon analysis performed//2 =Spin speed fit//3 =Orbit offset vector fit//4 =Pixel sampling rate fit//5 =Attitude refinement iteration based on horizon results//8 =Calculation of deformation vector field performed//9 =Completion of geometrical processing//10=Completion of rectification//11=Completion of amplitude processing

name: header3_LinePixelOrientation
description: Southern line, 1st/last pixel//Northern line, 1st/last pixel//East pixel, South line/North line//West pixel, South line/North line (valid in trailer)

name: header3_SatEarcthCentreDistance
description: Distance satellite - earth centre (valid in trailer)

name: header3_OrbitOffsetSouthernHorizon
description: X, Y, Z components of orbit offset vector in nominal image frame at Southern horizon limit (valid in trailer)

name: header3_OrbitOffsetNorthernHorizon
description: X, Y, Z components of orbit offset vector in nominal image frame at Northern horizon limit (valid in trailer)

name: header3_MaxDeformationDiffXInsideColumn
description: Max deformation difference X-comp within column (valid in trailer)

name: header3_MaxDeformationDiffYInsideLine
description: Max deformation difference Y-comp within line (valid in trailer)

name: header3_MaxDeformationDiffXInsideLine
description: Max deformation difference X-comp within line (valid in trailer)

name: header3_MaxDeformationDiffYInsideColumn
description: Max deformation difference Y-comp within column (valid in trailer)

name: header3_ImageConditions
description: Image conditions (valid in trailer)//1 =Earth within field of view in East/West//2 =Earth within field of view in North/South//3 =East/West horizon limits within predicted margin//4 =North/South horizon limits within predicted margin

name: header3_MinCountValue
description: Lowest non zero count in histogram (-1=Off) (IR1/2, VIS1/4, VIS2/3, WV1/2) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_MaxCountValue
description: Highest non zero count in histogram (-1=Off) (IR1/2, VIS1/4, VIS2/3, WV1/2) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_MeanVis1or4
description: Mean value of VIS1/4 (valid in trailer)

name: header3_MeanVis2or3
description: Mean value of VIS2/3 (valid in trailer)

name: header3_SnrSpaceCorners
description: Signal to noise ratio in space corners  (IR1/2, VIS1/4, VIS2/3, WV1/2) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_NumLinesSnrCalc
description: Number of lines used for S/N calculation (valid in trailer)

name: header3_SnrEastern
description: S/N ratios Eastern part (IR1/2, VIS1/4, VIS2/3, WV1/2) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_SnrWestern
description: S/N ratios Western part (IR1/2, VIS1/4, VIS2/3, WV1/2) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_MeanNoiseCountEastern
description: Mean noise count Eastern part (IR1/2, VIS1/4, VIS2/3, WV1/2) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_MeanNoiseCountWestern
description: Mean noise count Western part (IR1/2, VIS1/4, VIS2/3, WV1/2)) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_MaxSpaceCountEastern
description: Maximum space count Eastern part (IR1/2, VIS1/4, VIS2/3, WV1/2) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_MaxSpaceCountWestern
description: Maximum space count Western part (IR1/2, VIS1/4, VIS2/3, WV1/2) (valid in trailer)

name: header3_Message
description: Space kept for Administrative Message

name: header3_NominalSatLongitude
description: Nominal Satellite longitude in degrees (East =Positive)

name: header3_NominalSatLongitudeDeg
description: Nominal satellite longitude in degrees

name: header3_CodeSSP
description: Code for nominal sub-satellite point (EUR, WGG etc)

name: header3_NumLandmarks
description: Total number of landmarks (max =128)

name: header3_NumVisCloudFreeLandmarks
description: Number of visible landmarks that are judged cloud free

name: header3_NumIrCloudfreeLandmarks
description: Number of infrared landmarks that are judged cloud free

name: header3_GQASource
description: GQA Source Flag   (1)=Online, (2)=Archive, (3)=Offline (valid in trailer)

name: header3_HeaderVersionNumber
description: IPS RECT2LP Header Record 3 Version number

name: header3_NumVisLandmarksWithGoodCorr
description: Number of visible landmarks with a well formed correlation surface (valid in trailer)

name: header3_NumIrLandmarksWithGoodCorr
description: Number of infrared landmarks with a well formed correlation surface (valid in trailer)

name: header3_AbsStdVisLandmarks
description: Absolute standard deviation of visible landmarks (1)=line, (2)=pixel  (valid in trailer)

name: header3_AbsMaxVisLandmarks
description: Absolute maximum deviation of visible landmarks (1)=line, (2)=pixel  (valid in trailer)

name: header3_NumLandmarksWithMaxDeviation
description: Catalogue number of landmark for which absolute maximum deviation occurs (1)=line, (2)=pixel  //(valid in trailer)

name: header3_AbsStdIrLandmarks
description: Absolute standard deviation of infrared landmarks (1)=line, (2)=pixel   (valid in trailer)

name: header3_AbsMaxIrLandmarks
description: Absolute maximum deviation of infrared landmarks (1)=line, (2)=pixel   (valid in trailer)

name: header3_AbsLandmarkResults
description: Individual Landmark results of absolute landmark registration process for IR (ie compared to reference landmarks).//-reference Landmark line number from slot start//-reference Landmark pixel position value from slot start//-registered line offset//-registered pixel offset//-line offset after least square fit//-pixel offset after least square fit//-correlation factor obtained//(valid in trailer)

name: header3_NumVisLandmarksWithGoodCorr2
description: Number of visible landmarks with a well formed correlation surface (valid in trailer)

name: header3_NumIrLandmarksWithGoodCorr2
description: Number of infrared landmarks with a well formed correlation surface (valid in trailer)

name: header3_RelStdVisLandmarks
description: Relative standard deviation of visible landmarks (1)=line,  (2)=pixel  (valid in trailer)

name: header3_RelMaxVisLandmarks
description: Relative maximum deviation of visible landmarks (1)=line, (2)=pixel  (valid in trailer)

name: header3_NumLandmarksWithRelMaxDeviation
description: Catalogue number of landmark for which relative maximum deviation occurs (1)=line, (2)=pixel//(valid in trailer)

name: header3_RelStdIrLandmarks
description: Relative standard deviation of infrared landmarks (1)=line, (2)=pixel  (valid in trailer)

name: header3_RelMaxIrLandmarks
description: Relative maximum deviation of infrared landmarks (1)=line, (2)=pixel   (valid in trailer)

name: header3_RelLandmarkResults
description: Individual Landmark results of relative landmark registration process for IR (ie compared to reference landmarks).//-reference Landmark line number from slot start//-reference Landmark pixel position value from slot start//-registered line offset//-registered pixel offset//-line offset after least square fit//-pixel offset after least square fit//-correlation factor obtained//(valid in trailer)

name: header3_VisEqualisationCoef
description: Equalisation coefficient VISS/VISN (valid in trailer)  (not used)

name: header3_DifInPixelDirection
description: Difference in pixel direction of Batch and Real Time deformation matrices//- maximum deviation//- mean difference//- root mean square//- sigma//(valid in trailer)

name: header3_DifInLineDirection
description: Difference in line direction of Batch and Real-time deformation matrices//- maximum deviation//- mean difference//- root mean square//- sigma//(valid in trailer)

name: header3_RectificationFlag
description: Flag: 0 = Real time rectification not run//1 = Use Batch deformation matrix//2 = Use Real-time deformation matrix//(valid in trailer)

name: header3_GqaCheckFlag
description: GQA checks flag values as follows//41=image passed GQA checks//42=image failed GQA checks//43=GQA checks disabled//(valid in trailer)

name: header3_ImageProcessingStatus

name: trailer_JulianSlotNum
description: Julian slot number

description: Julian day (01 Jan 1950 =Day 0)

name: trailer_SlotNum
description: Slot number

name: trailer_NominalImageTime
description: Nominal image time (HHMM)

name: trailer_SlotType
description: Slot type: 0 = no data,  1 = nominal slot (never set), 2 = service slot, 3 = MOP format ,//4 = MAP slot (mini-scans) //(valid in the trailer)

name: trailer_ImageQualityFlag
description: Image quality flag 1 =grids can be added 2 =coastlines can be added//      3 =both can be added 0 =should not add either//(valid in trailer)

description: Imaging Sat ID  (M4, M5, ..)

description: Sub-satellite point displacement in lines (valid in trailer)

description: Missing line table IR (rectified image) (valid in trailer)

name: trailer_ImageQualityAnnotation

name: trailer_SpectralContent
description: Spectral contents VIS (for dissemination)//Spectral contents IR (for dissemination)//Spectral contents WV (for dissemination)//0 =no data 1 =VIS 1 2 =VIS 2 3 =VIS 1+2 4 =IR 1 5 =IR 2 6 =WV 1 7 =WV 2 8 =VIS 3 9 =VIS 4//10 =VIS 2 +3 11 =VIS 2 +4 12 =VIS 3 +4

description: Deformation model used://3 = Batch,        -3 =Batch, null deformation//7 = Real time,   -7 =Real time, null deformation//(valid in trailer)

name: trailer_BbIrCountForSpaceView
description: BB IR count for space view calibration (XXX.XXX): corresponds to delta count between hot black body and space, averaged by IPS. (valid in trailer)

description: Standard deviation of BB IR count for space view calibration (X.XX) (valid in trailer)

description: BB WV count for space view calibration (XXX.XXX): corresponds to delta count between hot black body and space, averaged by IPS. (valid in trailer)

description: Temp. of 'cold' black body in K (XXX.XX): : this only for nominal (not space view) calibration. (valid in trailer)

name: trailer_BbWarmTemp
description: Temp. of 'hot' black body in K (XXX.XX): for nominal and space view calibration (valid in trailer)

name: trailer_BbIrCountNominal
description: BB IR count for nominal calibration mode (XXX.XXX): corresponds to delta count between hot black body and space, averaged by IPS. (valid in trailer)

name: trailer_StdBbIrCountNominal
description: Standard deviation of black body IR count for nominal calibration mode (X.XX) (valid in trailer)

description: BB WV count for nominal calibration mode (XXX.XXX): corresponds to delta count between hot black body and space, averaged by IPS. (valid in trailer)

description: Standard deviation of black body WV count for nominal calibration mode (X.XX) (valid in trailer)

name: lineinfo_JulianSlotNum
description: Julian slot number

name: lineinfo_LineNr
description: Image line number (in range 1-2500)

name: lineinfo_ChannelIdVIS
description: Channel indicator (0 when no data): South Visible =1, North Visible =2,Both Visible  =3

name: lineinfo_ChannelIdIR
description: Channel indicator (0 when no data):Infrared =4

name: lineinfo_ChannelIdWV
description: Channel indicator (0 when no data):Water Vapour  =6

name: lineinfo_RectLineStatus
description: Infrared ("space corners" have a value of zero)

name: lineinfo_LineStatus
description: Water Vapour ("space corners" have a value of zero)

name: lineinfo_TimefitFlag
description: Rectified line status: zero indicates that the line is ok, an error is indicated by adding up //the following values: //1 = line generated using data from radiometer stoppage//2 = line generated using corrupted lines//4 = line generated using missing lines//8 = not completely IR gain corrected//16 = not completely WV gain corrected//32 = line unavailable (blank)

name: lineinfo_FirstRectPix
description: Line status mask: zero indicates ok, error are indicated by adding up the following values//1=Format changed (normal/burst) during line//2=Partial line (missing segments)//4=Auxiliary data inconsistent//8=Satellite code unexpected//16=Sequence counter or segment counter out of sequence

name: lineinfo_TimeFirstRectPix
description: Timefit flag: 0=no fit, 5= fitting with 5 coefficients

name: lineinfo_LastRectPix
description: First rectified pixel in line

name: lineinfo_TimeLastRectPix
description: Time(secs since midnight) of first rectified pixel in line

name: lineinfo_FirstFitPix
description: Last rectified pixel in line

name: lineinfo_LastFitPix
description: Time(secs since midnight) of last rectified pixel in line

name: lineinfo_MaxDevFit
description: First rectified pixel of time/pixel fit

name: lineinfo_FitCoef
description: Last rectified pixel of time/pixel fit

name: lineinfo_FirstTime
description: Maximum deviation of time/pixel fit

name: lineinfo_Interval
description: Coefficients of time/pixel fit

name: lineinfo_TimesArray
description: First pixel of rectified pixel times
